item.title: Statistical analyses of Siamese fighting fish aggressive behavior
item.description: Project: analyze behavior of Siamese fighting fish (Betta splendens) as part of a collaboration between the Bendesky and Cunningham labs of the Zuckerman Institute (NeuroTheory Center)
